utterances.text: Ginny's up today Sir may I help you he had to go to another store can I help you
they're not gonna big hole in the mattress when it was delivered we've been mine for the past ten years from your store I can't believe you sell something like that
we appreciate your loyalty towards our store I'm terribly sorry for that I can't leave our warehouse the shipping damage piece of furniture
what I just told you they did it don't you believe me
I'm sorry Sir I didn't mean that you weren't telling the truth I meant that I was surprised that we did that do you have your sales receipt
you've got to have a sofa by Wednesday my Darling I will be coming to stay with us on Wednesday
yes Sir we'll take care of it for you I'm sure we can fix the problem
